QuestData.Title: Stormbreaker
QuestData.Description:
$n, to me! We are within reach of victory!
The Primalist ranks are broken, and their war is all but through. Everything we have achieved hinges on this final battle against the Primalist leader, Koroleth.
Let us finish this, you and I! Together! To battle, $Gbrother:sister;!
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: This primalist leader seeks to destroy the green dragons' sanctuary.
QuestData.RewardText: At last, it is done. Our sacred isle is safe once again. Thank you for all you have done for my kind, $n.
